item.title: TOST
item.description: score:122 Chances: Toast has continued to execute on its mandate to transform the restaurant industry with technology, despite the macroeconomic headwinds. The company has increased its number of clients and broadened its offerings across the industry, leading to revenue growth. Investing in growth stocks like Toast, SentinelOne, and Chewy could present terrific buying opportunities.
